 2024-00772024-02-02FIN
ActIncome Tax Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Income Tax Regulations (Battery Assembly and Manufacturing Production Support)
PrecisRegulations Amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS (BATTERY ASSEMBLY AND MANUFACTURING PRODUCTION SUPPORT) in order to exempt the contributions received by NextStar and PowerCo under the special contribution agreements from income tax.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0009 Publication Date: 2024-02-14
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS (BATTERY ASSEMBLY AND MANUFACTURING PRODUCTION SUPPORT) in order to exempt the contributions received by NextStar and PowerCo under the special contribution agreements from income tax.
